ygData.subject: regex question
ygData.msgSnippet: I used the default regex expression with Heritrix 2.0.2 to display remaining URIs without a problem.  I used the same expression in 1.14.3 and get no results.

I used the default regex expression with Heritrix 2.0.2 to display remainin=
g URIs without a problem.  I used the same expression in 1.14.3 and get no =
results.  Am I doing something wrong?

1. I paused my Heritrix 1.14.3 crawl=
.  
2. Clicked View or Edit Frontier URIs
3. enter ^.*?$  in the URI match =
regex textbox 
4. and click display URIs. 
5. nothing happens

Thanks,
Chri=
